CWEs: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function is vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks. The function decodes URL parameters without properly sanitizing the input. An attacker could inject malicious scripts through the URL parameters, which would then be executed when the page is loaded. This could lead to a variety of attacks, such as stealing sensitive information or performing actions on behalf of the user.
